author: Wayne Collins
method: Heat all of the cider toddy ingredients over a low heat until warmed through. Pour the cider toddy into 4 latte glasses or other heatproof glasses. Finish with a little freshly grated nutmeg.
ingredients: 4 cardamom pods, lightly crushed,  1 clementine, sliced into wedges, spiked with 8 cloves,  1 lemon, sliced into wedges, spiked with 8 cloves,  100ml/4fl oz whisky ,  100ml/4fl oz orange liqueur,  3 tbsp clear honey,  1 litre/1 pint 15Â¼fl oz cider ,  4 cinnamon stick,  freshly grated nutmeg, to garnish
